org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Interface Strategy<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of histories
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemoryfulStrategy, MemorylessStrategy

    public interface Strategy<T>
    This interface defines general strategies. A strategy of a player here is allowed to guide a state to multiple successors that all lead the player to win.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<GameState> getSuccessors(GameState s, T history)
      Returns the successors of a state in this strategy.
